org.apache.hadoop.fs
类 FSDataOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.FilterOutputStream
          java.io.DataOutputStream
              org.apache.hadoop.fs.FSDataOutputStream
所有已实现的接口：
Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, Syncable
@InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public class FSDataOutputStream
extends DataOutputStream
implements Syncable

Utility that wraps a OutputStream in a DataOutputStream, buffers output through a BufferedOutputStream and creates a checksum file.

字段摘要

从类 java.io.FilterOutputStream 继承的字段

方法摘要
 void close()
           
 long getPos()
           
 OutputStream getWrappedStream()
           
 void hflush()
          Flush out the data in client's user buffer.
 void hsync()
          Similar to posix fsync, flush out the data in client's user buffer all the way to the disk device (but the disk may have it in its cache).
 void sync()
          已过时。

另请参见：
Syncable.hflush()

hflush

public void hflush()
            throws IOException
从接口 Syncable 复制的描述
Flush out the data in client's user buffer. After the return of this call, new readers will see the data.

指定者：
接口 Syncable 中的 hflush
抛出：
IOException - if any error occurs

hsync

public void hsync()
           throws IOException
从接口 Syncable 复制的描述
Similar to posix fsync, flush out the data in client's user buffer all the way to the disk device (but the disk may have it in its cache).

指定者：
接口 Syncable 中的 hsync
抛出：
IOException - if error occurs
